articles.title: 'They will get out…': Karthik issues startling statement after AUS thrash IND - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Reflecting on India's batting performance against the Mitchell Starc-starrer side, Dinesh Karthik defended Indian batters after the host registered their third-lowest ODI total against Australia. | Cricket
articles.content: Veteran Indian batter Dinesh Karthik hailed Australia's Mitchell Starc as the best white-ball bowler in the world after the speedster sparked a shocking batting collapse of Rohit Sharma and Co. in th… [+2535 chars]

articles.author: Ayana Archie
articles.title: Millions of dead fish have been found in an Australian river due to low oxygen levels - NPR
articles.description: Millions of dead fish have been found dead in an Australian river due to dangerously low oxygen levels in the water caused by receding flood waters, government officials said.
articles.content:
Dead fish lay on the bank of the Darling River near Menindee, Australia, Sunday, March 19, 2023.
Samara Anderson/AP

articles.author: Helen Regan
articles.title: Former Australian soldier arrested for alleged war crime in Afghanistan - CNN
articles.description: A former soldier has become the first serving Australian serviceman or veteran charged with the war crime of murder for allegedly killing a civilian while on deployment in Afghanistan.
articles.content:
